mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: "New Partners", "Alive and Well In Sweden", "Tour Guide for 1983", "Japan Diary" and "National Convention." This edition also includes the regular features entitled "From the Floor" (letters to the editor), "As I See It", "Advanced Dancing", "On The Record", "Mostly Modular", "Contra Corner", "Take A Good Look", "The Dancers Walkthru", "Traditional Treasury", "Roundancer Module", "Paging the Round Dancers", "The Callers Notebook", "Ladies on the Square", "Experimental Notes", "Style Lab", "Round the World of Square Dancing", "Workshop", "Caller of the Month", "Current Releases" and "Square Dance Date Book."
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
